channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No, That Wood-Chopping Illegal Alien in Washington State Is Not a 'Firefighter' or 'Victim'
White House advances plan for Department of War as Trump looks to restore historical military title
item.description: Trump plans to rename the Department of Defense as the Department of War, reversing a post-World War II change to restore historical military naming.

item.description: President Donald Trump is reportedly planning to skip the upcoming - though not yet scheduled - Quad summit this fall, The New York Times reported.
